        public static ArrayList<TimeSeriesUtil.Gap> performGapAnalysis​(StatsIndex series,
                                                               String label)
        Parameters:
        series - The time series.
        label - A label to identify the time series.
        Returns:
        List of gaps.

      • performOutlierDetection

        public static ArrayList<TimeSeriesUtil.Outlier> performOutlierDetection​(StatsIndex series,
                                                                        int w,
                                                                        double thNbStd,
                                                                        double diffTh,
                                                                        String label)
        Parameters:
        series - The time series.
        w - The half-width of the smoothing window for the trend construction and the dispersion calculation. Advised value: 6 for monthly data.
        thNbStd - The number of STD used to consider a value as possible outlier. Advised value: 3.
        diffTh - The minimal difference to consider a value as possible outlier. Advised value: 0.
        label - A label to identify the time series.
        Returns:
        List of outliers.

      • performOutlierDetection

        public static ArrayList<TimeSeriesUtil.Outlier> performOutlierDetection​(StatsIndex series,
                                                                        int w,
                                                                        String label)
